member.name: M:_2a.Controllers.CurrencyConverterController.ConvertCurrency(_2a.Models.ConversionRequest)
member.summary: Converts an amount from one currency to another using current or historical exchange rates.
member.param: A object containing the details of the conversion: from currency, to currency, the amount to convert, and an optional date for historical rates.
member.returns: An ActionResult of type that contains the converted amount if the conversion is successful; otherwise, returns a BadRequest with the error message.
member.remarks: This endpoint receives a POST request with the conversion details. It performs an asynchronous operation to convert the specified amount from the source to the target currency. If the conversion is successful, a is returned with the result. In case of an error, such as an invalid currency code or an exception in the conversion process, a BadRequest is returned along with the error details.
